mapper.select: SELECT answer.id, answer.content, IFNULL(SUM(vote_for_answer.value), 0) AS votes_count, answer.created_by, answer.created_at FROM answer LEFT JOIN question ON answer.answer_for = question.id LEFT JOIN vote_for_answer ON answer.id = vote_for_answer.vote_for WHERE question.id = #{qid} GROUP BY answer.id
